channel.title: Zdiddy NPC damage
channel.description:
People are saying go to NPC.cfg and change the NPC damage there, but mine doesnt say damage.
*Before you flame, I am just using that source as a starter not taking it and then staying there and saying I made it* *I am completely changing it.*
Back to the point.
Where can I change my NPC damage at?
